name: friendica
description: Friendica is a decentralized social network that federates with platforms like Mastodon, Diaspora, and ActivityPub. It offers privacy controls, timeline views, and supports short-form posts, blogs, and private messaging.
features: Social Network: Decentralized platform, Federation with Mastodon and Diaspora, ActivityPub support. Own your social presence.
Privacy Controls: Granular permissions. Control your data.
Content Types: Posts, blogs, messaging. Versatile communication.
Timeline Views: Familiar social interface. Easy to use.
Federation: Connect with other networks. Interoperable platform.
Photo Albums: Share images. Visual content.
Private Messaging: Secure communication. Direct conversations.
Self-Hosted: Own your social data. Complete control.
